div.p: Definition: Specifies an identifier assigned to an entity by either the placer or the filler system. If both components are populated the identifiers must refer to the same entity.
Note: Replaces the CM data type used in sections 4.5.1.8 - ORC-8, 4.5.3.29 – OBR-29, 7.3.1.29 – OBR-29, as of v 2.5.
Definition: Specifies an identifier assigned to an entity by the placer system.
For example, the component might be used to convey the following:

li.p: placer order number of the parent order.
the specimen identifier as assigned by the placer.
a location identifier assigned (or used by) the placer.

div.p: Definition: Specifies an identifier assigned to an entity by the filler system.
For example, the component might convey the following:

li.p: filler order number of the parent order.
the specimen identifier as assigned by the filler.
a location identifier assigned (or used by) the filler.
